name: orordi
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: bitr3i(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w0), w0)

|- wb(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wo(wo(w0, w0), wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

comment: Distribution of disjunction over disjunction. (Contributed by NM, 25-Feb-1995.)
